about.title: About SmartPlate
about.heroDesc: SmartPlate is an AI-powered nutrition companion that helps you track, analyze, and improve your eating habits effortlessly.
about.missionDesc: We believe that good nutrition shouldn't be complicated. Our mission is to make healthy eating accessible to everyone through the power of artificial intelligence and intuitive design.
about.feature1Desc: Get instant nutritional insights for any meal with our advanced AI technology. Simply describe what you ate and receive detailed feedback.
about.feature2Desc: Discover healthy recipes from around the world, curated and optimized for nutrition without sacrificing flavor.
about.feature3Desc: Generate personalized weekly meal plans tailored to your goals, preferences, and dietary restrictions.
about.value1Desc: We make nutrition tracking effortless and intuitive.
about.value2Desc: We use cutting-edge AI to provide reliable nutritional insights.
about.value3Desc: Your health data is yours. We protect it with industry-standard security.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introDesc: At SmartPlate, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.collectDesc: We collect information you provide directly:
privacy.collectItem2: Profile data (age, weight, height, dietary preferences)
privacy.usageItem2: Generate tailored meal plans and recommendations
privacy.usageItem3: Improve our AI models and service quality
privacy.usageItem4: Send important service updates (with your consent)
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We use OpenAI to power our AI analysis features. When you submit a meal for analysis, the meal description is sent to OpenAI's servers. No personally identifiable information is shared with OpenAI.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacy.gdprItem4: Export your data in a portable format
privacy.contactDesc: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing or using SmartPlate, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.
terms.serviceDesc: SmartPlate is an AI-powered nutrition tracking and meal planning platform. We provide tools to help you log meals, analyze nutritional content, discover recipes, and plan your weekly meals.
terms.accountsDesc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must provide accurate information when creating your account and keep it up to date.
terms.contentDesc: You retain ownership of any recipes or content you create. By submitting content, you grant SmartPlate a license to use, display, and share your content within the platform.
terms.disclaimerDesc: SmartPlate provides nutritional information for educational purposes only. Our AI analysis and recommendations are not medical advice. Always consult a healthcare professional or registered dietitian before making significant changes to your diet, especially if you have health conditions.
terms.liabilityDesc: SmartPlate is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the service, including reliance on AI-generated nutritional advice.
terms.changesDesc: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of SmartPlate after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroDesc: Have questions, feedback, or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.emailDesc: For general inquiries, support, or partnerships:
contact.socialDesc: Stay updated with the latest features and nutrition tips.
contact.feedbackDesc: Your feedback helps us improve SmartPlate. Don't hesitate to share your ideas and suggestions!
